knimeNode.name: Conformer Generator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generates conformers using the OpenChemLib conformer generator.

fullDescription.intro: Generates conformers using the OpenChemLib conformer generator. Several algorithms and different options are available.
fullDescription.option: Input column with OCLMolecules for which conformers should be generated
